law.catch_line: Selection of Kentucky's members on interstate organizations.
law.text: The Commission shall select Kentucky's member on the board of managers of the Council of State Governments. The Commission also is authorized to select from among the members of the General Assembly, the legislative member or members of any interstate body created by statute if no other method of selection of such member or members is set forth by statute.
law.history: Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 6, effectiveJune 16, 1966.
